name: custom-audio
description: A pretty straightforward web component audio player I put together for a refresh of liovabueno.com. No configuration to speak of, although it relies on CSS custom properties for some styling.

scripts.build: npx svgo -f ./svg -o ./assets && npx terser  audioplayer.js --compress --mangle --output audioplayer.min.js

author: Iain Gillis
